text:
log4j Javadoc documentation has stale links to Sun wesite, using 'jdk' instead 
of 'j2se'.

For example, links for Object point to: 

http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.3/docs/api/java/lang/Object.html

and should point to:

http://java.sun.com/products/j2se/1.3/docs/api/java/lang/Object.html
creator: n_olding@hotmail.com
mprice@atl.lmco.com
text:
Created attachment 12266
Patch to resolve this issue.
*** Bug 27117 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: mprice@atl.lmco.com
psmith@apache.org
text: Thank you Michael for the patch, applied.
